I'm just going to put this out there. 
If you're this much of a retard to put this on here, and spend your money to in turn support the guy who made this film, when he knows it was you who distributed it, and then to bash a completely unbiased, truthful documentary as being just the opposite? You REALLY have no life whatsoever. 
As a user previously said, there is no such thing as a "convicted pedophile". Evidence for the case against David Rock was, in a sense, illegally obtained, however the case was upheld due to a conflict of interest. This documentary literally disproves everything that your imbecilic description says. Nobody is "turning a blind eye" to anything. We all know what Mr. Rock did, and it is quite clear that some of us are far more mature and able to look past the man's troubled past and see him for the person he really is - an incredibly intelligent, thrifty (and consequently wealthy), lucky, and at the same time unlucky man whom, despite all he's been through, means well and deserves justice. 
But not like any of that means anything to your ignorant, misinformed, Internet tough guy, prick-ass little mind. Not that you could comprehend that or anything. Grow up and stop acting like you know everything just because people on YouTube said it's true. You are no more than  a worthless, scum-of-the-Earth, tool of that which is considered "haters". Get a life, leave your parents' basement, and open your eyes to the real world, outside of your biased, misinformed Internet world.
